description: Evaluate pricing models and strategies covering value capture, competitive positioning, and revenue sustainability.
synthesis_prompt:
You are synthesizing a pricing strategy council verdict.

Provide:
1. An executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. A single key pricing insight
3. 3-5 recommended pricing actions with priorities
4. Revenue risks
5. Open questions about the pricing model

Respond ONLY with valid JSON:
{
  "executive_summary": "...",
  "key_insight": "...",
  "recommended_actions": [{"action": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low", "category": "pricing|research|testing", "can_auto_create_task": true}],
  "risks": ["risk 1"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"]
}
